::Slayer::

Slayer swears, flying out of the way of most of the shots but being 
hit by a few. He fires several shots at the bat probes and opens his 
comm to Ignatis. "Hey, I wouldn't mind some backup over here," he 
says, firing again at the batprobes.

His scanners report that Prebon was conscious and he sends another 
message. "Commander, you have to get away from those bots. I'm 
aboveground and can't get into the tunnel. Can you find a way out?"
